Luckbolt.name: Luckbolt
Luckbolt.fullText:
Luckbringer of Tymora Utility 12Luckbolt

A silvery-blue radiance streaks away from the Luckbringer to surround a companion, imbuing the recipient with bountiful good fortune.

Daily        Conjuration, Divine
Standard Action      Close burst 10

Target: You or one ally within the burst

Effect: The target makes saving throws against all effects that a save can end. The target gains a +4 bonus to all these saving throws.


Published in Dragon Magazine 365, page(s) 24.
Luckbolt.flavor: A silvery-blue radiance streaks away from the Luckbringer to surround a companion, imbuing the recipient with bountiful good fortune.
Luckbolt.target: You or one ally within the burst
Luckbolt.effect: The target makes saving throws against all effects that a save can end. The target gains a +4 bonus to all these saving throws.

Inauspicious Vulnerability.name: Inauspicious Vulnerability
Inauspicious Vulnerability.fullText:
Luckbringer of Tymora Attack 20Inauspicious Vulnerability

You unleash a terrible malaise upon your enemies, weakening
their resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder.

Encounter        Cold, Divine, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Standard Action      Area burst 2 within 10 squares

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Effect: Enemies in the burst gains a vulnerability 10 + your Charisma modifier to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder (save ends).


Published in Dragon Magazine 365, page(s) 24.
Inauspicious Vulnerability.flavor:
You unleash a terrible malaise upon your enemies, weakening
their resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder.
keywords: Cold, Divine, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Inauspicious Vulnerability.effect: Enemies in the burst gains a vulnerability 10 + your Charisma modifier to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder (save ends).

Divine Tilt.name: Divine Tilt
Divine Tilt.fullText:
Luckbringer of Tymora Attack 11Divine Tilt

You channel the divine radiance of Lady Luck to protect you and your allies against enemy attacks, while bringing ill luck to your foes.

Encounter        Divine, Implement
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Target: All allies within the burst

Effect: All allies within the burst gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Secondary Target: Each enemy in the burst.

Attack: Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: All enemies in the burst take a –5 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.


Update (5/27/2011)
Changed to match May rules update.

Published in Dragon Magazine 365, page(s) 24.
Divine Tilt.flavor: You channel the divine radiance of Lady Luck to protect you and your allies against enemy attacks, while bringing ill luck to your foes.
Divine Tilt.effect: All allies within the burst gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Divine Tilt.onHit: All enemies in the burst take a –5 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
